scenes.background: After discussing efficiency, Monica seems uneasy and approaches you.
scenes.description: Im still worried about handling everything on time.

options.text: Let's take another look at our priorities to see what can be adjusted.
options.analysis: You offered a collaborative approach, showing good perception and empathy, but your self-regulation could be slightly improved.

options.text: I understand your concern, but I believe we can manage if we stay focused.
options.analysis: You expressed confidence and focus, demonstrating strong self-regulation and motivation, but your empathy was lower.

options.text: If it's too much, maybe we should discuss redistributing some tasks.
options.analysis: You showed concern for your colleague's well-being and suggested a practical solution, but your self-regulation could be improved.
